Member Function Documentation

void FtpServerSocket::OnAsyncEvent (  Event  event  )  [protected, virtual]
 

Receives the notification of an asynchronous event. The event types are dependent on the socket type, some events are only sent for connection oriented sockets or for server sockets (please see the enumeration Event). A client who uses sockets has to derive an own socket class and implement this method in order to listen to the events that occur on the socket and to react on it according to its communication policy.

Reimplemented from InetSocket.
